name: La Galère Volante
description:
La Galère Volante is a coop game for 2 in top view where you act the part of a pirate crew. 

 Your objective is to gather as many treasures as possible while dodging obstacles and fleeing from the shadows. 

The ship is equipped with stations such as canons to catch treasures, a wheel to dodge obstacles, reactors to boost, and a workshop to repair. You are only 2 so choose wisely!

 Developed during the BJV Game Jam 2021. 

  • Laetitia PIGEON - ART 
  • Ambre FORTIN - ART 
  • Adrien CARADEC - ART 
  • Basile MILLEREUX - PROGRAMMING 
  • Matthias JOHAN - DESIGN / SOUND

 Engine: SMFL in C 

Art assets: Photoshop

 SFX assets: SFXR

 Pixel art direction and 8-bit sound design!
